channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Top of the South
channel.desc: PREMIERE: At the top of South Island, from Golden Bay to the Marlborough Sounds, a community of M?ori are fighting to maintain their way of life and a connection to the sea that was passed down to them from their t?puna. As modernity threatens this existence, how far will they go to protect their way of life, and secure the future of their grandchildren.
